comment: Pharm is a hard class in general but Kruszka does a fantastic job in giving you only the material that is needed. Her lectures are very straightforward and are right off of the power points.
This instructor makes powerpoints from the book and only reads from them in lecture.  When ask a question in class she doesn't give an answer, only refers you back to the book.
Mrs. Kruzka is very helpful and will take time to answer questions. You should go to class. Your grade will reflect it. lectures clarify power points and test hints are throughout the lecture.

This professor is extremely knowledgable. If you have a question you should ask. She will be happy to help. GO TO CLASS. if you miss her lectures you will miss a lot on the tests. Power points change during class. GO TO CLASS. so many people skip and so many people regret it.
